title: Hutments having a physically handicapped person or female- headed households shall be given first preference in allotment of tenements to the other hutment-dwellers
clause_text: Hutments having a physically handicapped person or female- headed households shall be given first preference in allotment of tenements to the other hutment-dwellers. Thereafter lots shall be drawn for allotment of tenements from the remaining tenements to the other hutment-dwellers.
